name: Kamuna Harunosuke
desc: The creator of the Mystic Onmyou Chamber, who lived about 500 years ago.

customize.text:
The Yougou Three
More than 500 years ago, Asase Hibiki, Kamuna Harunosuke, and Mikoshi Nagamasa went to Mt. Yougou to learn under the Yougou Tengu.

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text: After the Cataclysm 500 years ago and the death of his friends, Kamuna Harunosuke went to
as he wanted to learn the more powerful way of the

customize.name: Adepti
customize.desc: Adepti are a group of immortal illuminated beasts of Liyue, who have protected people for millennia.

customize.name: Ioroi
customize.desc: A bake-danuki, who was sealed in a statue by Kamuna Harunosuke.

customize.text: When Kitsune Saiguu died during the Cataclysm, Ioroi began to wreak havoc around himself in order to lure his friend out. He stole the ward needed to cleanse the Sacred Sakura, thinking it was an ordinary comb. For this, the Shogun sent Kamuna Harunosuke to deal with Ioroi, who turned the bake-danuki king and the other tanuki of the forest into stone.

customize.name: Hanachirusato
customize.desc: A mysterious shrine maiden from the Grand Narukami Shrine.

customize.text:
Although Kamuna Harunosuke knew that Hanachirusato was not the real Kitsune Saiguu but filth, he helped her with the Sacred Sakura Cleansing ritual and didn't harm her.
Onmyoudou
After returning from Liyue to Inazuma, Kamuna Harunosuke created the Onmyoudou Art, which uses special paper seals to harness elemental power. Harunosuke created the Mystic Onmyou Chamber to practice the art and train warriors, but the chamber was later disbanded.

customize.name: Shiki Koshou
customize.desc:
A gift from Shiki Taishou: a replica armed with spiritual power.

Though Shiki Koshou is incapable of charm magic, it is in contact with Shiki Taishou at all times and can share all that it has seen and heard with him, so it's almost like you've still got Shiki Taishou with you on your journey.

customize.text: A replica of Shiki Taishou, the guardian of the Mystic Onmyou Chamber
